en: Here is the bean, where is the one that pulps?

ngiemboon: Ɔ̀ lɔɔn ńkwá nkáʼ gú, té píme, mbà é té tʉte wɔ́.
en: If you attach your fence without support, it will not be strong.
Come after and take your money.

ngiemboon: Mbìte nò yɛ̂, nyě tè tó.
en: The narrator of this affair has not yet come.
